import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Form } from 'reactstrap'; import { Button, ButtonGroup, FormGroup, InputGroup, HTMLTable, NumericInput } from '@blueprintjs/core'; import { DateInput } from '@blueprintjs/datetime'; import ProjectOptions from '../Selects/ProjectOptions'; import EmployeesOptions from '../Selects/EmployeesOptions'; export default class KPIForm extends Component { render() { const { onChange, onTargetValueChange, onSubmit, buttonCaption, onClear, name, //String time_from, //Date time_to, //date target, // number project, //ProjectOPt manager //ManagerOPT } = this.props; return (
time_from.toLocaleString()[0] } onChange={this.props.handleDateFromChange} parseDate={time_from => new Date(time_from).toLocaleString() } placeholder='DD/MM/YYYY' defaultValue={new Date()} value={time_from} /> time_to.toLocaleString()} onChange={this.props.handleDateToChange} parseDate={time_to => new Date(time_to)} placeholder='DD/MM/YYYY' defaultValue={new Date()} value={time_to} />
); } } KPIForm.defaultProps = { addButtonCaption: 'Add' };
